catalyst: The photocatalyst used in the experiment is HGONTP (Hydroxyl-grafted oxygen-and nitrogen-linked tri-s-triazine-based polymers) with photodeposited 3 wt% of Pt.
co_catalyst: The photocatalytic conversion efficiency of CO2 to CO reaches as high as 3.3 mol g-1 h-1 without cocatalysts and sacrificial agents.
